Uses of Class
nl.nikhef.jgridstart.Organisation

  • Packages that use Organisation 
    Package Description
    nl.nikhef.jgridstart
    Core jGridstart functionality regarding .globus-type certificates.

    • Uses of Organisation in nl.nikhef.jgridstart

      Fields in nl.nikhef.jgridstart with type parameters of type Organisation 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static HashMap<String,Organisation> Organisation.orgIndex
      global list of all organisations, indexed by configfile index
      protected static HashMap<String,Organisation> Organisation.orgRdn
      global list of all organisations, indexed by x-full-rdn
      Methods in nl.nikhef.jgridstart that return Organisation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Organisation Organisation.get(String xfullrdn)
      Get an organisation by identifier.
      static Organisation[] Organisation.getAll()
      Return the list of organisations
      static Organisation Organisation.getFromCertificate(CertificatePair cert)
      Returns the Organisation belonging to a CertificatePair, or null of not found.
      Organisation Organisation.getParent()
      Return the parent for this sub-unit, or null if none.
      Organisation Organisation.getSubUnit(String ou)
      Return a sub-unit for this organisation
